title: Built to scale your AUM
subtitle: Premier connects professional managers and investors through a transparent PAMM framework where incentives stay aligned. When your strategy performs well, investors benefit and your assets under management can grow.

cards.title: Real time monitoring
cards.subtitle: Investors can view your performance, open positions, and historical results in real time through the portal.

cards.title: Flexible allocation
cards.subtitle: Subject to the agreed terms, investors can increase, reduce, or close their allocation without interrupting your trading process.

cards.title: Accurate allocation logic
cards.subtitle: Percentage allocations, trade sizes, and P and L are handled by the PAMM system, which reduces manual work and rounding issues.
